PageTitle: display multicast global outgoing-interface pim sm statistics
FuncDef: The display multicast global outgoing-interface pim sm statistics command displays statistics about outbound interfaces in IPv4 PIM-SM entries.
CLIs: display multicast global outgoing-interface pim sm statistics
Examples: <HUAWEI> display multicast global outgoing-interface pim sm statistics
Total number of outgoing interfaces in (*, G) entries: 100
Total number of outgoing interfaces in (S, G) entries: 100
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
You can run this command to check whether the total number of outbound interfaces in IPv4 PIM-SM entries exceeds the upper limit.
